nodes.title: New Acoustic Lighting Solutions from BuzziSpace

childMarkdownRemark.html: BuzziBurner, BuzziPebl, and BuzziSurf address lighting and acoustics with a single solution.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: BuzziBurner, BuzziPebl, and BuzziSurf address lighting and acoustics with a single solution.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
BuzziSpace has launched a new collection of acoustic lighting solutions that addresses the issue of excessive noise in spaces where people work and socialize.

The collection includes three lighting designs: BuzziPebl, BuzziBurner, and BuzziSurf, each featuring integrated sound-absorbing materials that help to reduce echoes and noise.

These lighting solutions are designed with contemporary and decorative elements and come in warm, amorphous shapes that are of the moment. Theyâ€™re designed to fit into all spaces from work to hospitality to home.

BuzziPebl

The BuzziPebl Light is a wall sconce that offers indirect accent lighting and can be wall-mounted or ceiling-suspended.

BuzziBurner

BuzziBurner features a cone-shaped shade that provides dimmable LED lighting and acoustic privacy.

BuzziSurf

BuzziSurf is an acoustic pendant light with an elongated surfboardish design and is available in a variety of shapes and sizes.

BuzziSpace offers a helpful, free downloadable BuzziSpace RT60 v3.0 app for iOS designed to measure the reverberation time of room acoustics. It allows you to easily simulate the impact BuzziSpace products would have on your space.

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of BuzziSpace. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Spring is a beautiful season filled with freshness and rebirth. Our Spring 2022 Collection has us prepared and excited for the structure and rhythm of getting back some of our previous normal.

Explore The Spring Collection...

Our collection has been built around these ideas, with compositions made out of wood by Artist Anna Bailey, to folds of fabric and plaster by artist Jessy Wilson.

We look to the striking bold hues of Genevive Leopoldâ€™s gestural paintings for energy and rejoice at seeing the spring foliage and whimsical illustrations of Marta Cortese.

We also saved some new floral works from our artist Paz IrarrÃ¡zaval to introduce to you this spring. Enjoy!

childMarkdownRemark.html:
With high-performance LEDs enclosed in a unique, prismatic shade, RBW's new Print collection offers the classic globe, elevated. Its striking surface, achieved by acclaimed designer Sylvain Willenz, is imprinted with a diamond texture that creates an understated, sparkling play of light.

Explore the Print Collection

The Print Collection was designed in collaboration with Sylvain Willenz, an award-winning, independent designer based in Brussels, Belgium. His furniture, lighting, and textile design is distinguished by its striking graphic quality, combining clarity of function with elegance of form. This celebrated approach is apparent in Print's visual coherence and refinement.

Offered in various finishes and fine-tuned for optimal light quality, Printâ€™s versatile design works well across a range of applicationsâ€”at home, in the workplace and in hospitality settingsâ€”indoors and outdoors.

Print's refined pattern and texture enhances the familiar globe as a pendant, sconce, or flush mount in two finishes and sizes.

Explore the Print Collection

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of RBW. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, do not hesitate to contact us.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Arktura's new Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D adaptive baffle systems bring almost any design vision for linear and undulating straight baffles to reality.

Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D offer fins that are fully tailorable to the needs of your project in Arktura's high performance acoustic Soft Sound material.

In addition to amazing configurability, Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D utilize a new rib and assembly system that incorporates standard T-Grid as a foundational structure.

Versa's new rib and assembly system provides several cost and performance benefits, including enhanced flexibility, ease-of-install, and sound-attenuating performance.

Explore Atmosphera Versa

With Versa 3D, use undulating linear baffles to create ceiling scapes that influence people's movement, impression, and memory of the space in a fun creative way. Provide your own surface design or work with the Arktura team to craft the ceilingâ€™s flow.

Want to learn more about how Versa and Versa 3D can work for you? Watch Arktura's newest video to learn about the design flexibility Atmosphera Versa and Versa 3D offer, and the exciting new opportunities for creative expression and acoustic control they can bring to your next project.

Explore Atmosphera Versa 3D

Loop carefully curates itâ€™s stable of lines to bring you the newest, highest quality and most innovative products available for glass, furniture, flooring, wall coverings, architectural wood products, acoustics & lighting.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Solutions for creating good, sustainable sound environments in public spaces are becoming increasingly important.

Offecct's new Soundwave Jasmine Acoustic Panel restores calm and reduces noise in offices, restaurants and other meeting places. Designed by OffecctÂ´s new designer Layla Mehdi Pour, Jasmine is inspired by nature's interplay between order and irregularity. The panel is shaped like a triangle and can be combined into various playful solutions.

When Layla Mehdi Pour designed Jasmine, she was inspired by natural elements that may seem irregular in their macro form, but in the details have a wonderful precision and regular structure. In this case, she started foremost from flowers and developed them into a concrete product with a playful character.

â€œI strived to capture natureÂ´s poetic rhythm and mix it with more geometric, triangular shapes that can be combined in different ways and create new expressions and compositions,â€ she states.

Jasmine works well to increase speech intelligibility in rooms when used as a complement to an acoustic ceiling. They complement the ceiling well in the frequencies where the need for absorption usually lies.

Offecct offers a wide range of sound absorbing wall panels, designed by world-leading designers. The versatile collection SoundwaveÂ® not only provides a good acoustic environment, but also brings character to the interior.

The Jasmine acoustic panel is the result of the first collaboration between Italy-based product designer Layla Mehdi Pour and Offecct.

Explore Jasmine Acoustic Panel
